alert.note: Alert for Peoria; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 08 at 5:04PM CDT until July 08 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Illinois, including the following counties, Peoria, Tazewell and Woodford. * WHEN...Until 815 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 503 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Peoria, East Peoria, Washington, Metamora, Germantown Hills, Rome, Dunlap, Spring Bay, Bay View Gardens, Peoria Heights, Cazenovia, Mossville and Alta. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
